name: documentation for peterthibeault.com
body:
# Welcome

This documentation for [peterthibeault.com](http://peterthibeault.com) will assist you with adding new items to the website.

---

When you first get to the site you will see a welcome screen. You can't do anything from this page other than be greeted. It should look like this:

![landing page](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wylie/peterthibeault/gh-pages/images/welcome-section.png)

---

## Works Section

The **Works** section is still being worked on, so nothing can be uploaded or edited at this time.

---

## Studio Section

The **Studio** section is up and running. _More documentation to come soon_.

---

## News Section

The **News** section is up and running. _More documentation to come soon_.

The **News** section is split into two sub-sections: New News & Old News. Let's start with the Old News. Here is a screenshot of what it may look like
![Old News](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wylie/peterthibeault/gh-pages/images/news-old.png)

You have all your old News stories listed starting at the top with the newest story and ending with the oldest story. The newest story also has a green border. This is the one that will be displayed first on the home page.

---

## CV Section

The **CV** section is still being worked on, so nothing can be uploaded or edited at this time.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
